Mitigation.Textual:
Add the following curves to the server configuration:
{add}
Remove the following curves from the server configuration:
{remove}
Mitigation.Apache:
-Easy solution: Replace the instruction of the directive SSLOpenSSLConfCmd groups with the following string:
{total_string}
-Expert solution: Check the directive SSLOpenSSLConfCmd groups and for each element in the Textual section, follow the instructions provided. The separator for this directive is : and to disable an element it is necessary to remove it from the string.
Mitigation.Nginx:
-Easy solution: Replace the instruction of the directive ssl_ecdh_curve with the following string:
{total_string}
-Expert solution: Check the directive ssl_ecdh_curve and for each element in the Textual section, follow the instructions provided. The separator for this directive is : and to disable an element it is necessary to remove it from the string.
